Details: ['Mariano Municoy', 'Head of Legal Department at Moeller IP', 'Argentina']
About:
['I am a lawyer and IP agent with more than 20 years of practical and academic experience dealing with the full range of IP issues locally (Argentina), regionally (Latin America) and internationally. 

Since March 2005 I have been working for the Latin American IP law firm Moeller IP Advisors where I advise and design legal/business strategies related to the creation, protection and enforcement of the whole range of IP rights such as patents, trade secrets, plant variety rights, trademarks, designs, domain names, advertisement claims, copyright as well as anti-counterfeiting, licensing, transfer of technology and regulatory affairs matters related to pharmaceuticals, medical devices, food products and the like.

So I am an active member of IP organizations such as INTA, IPO and ABA; plus I regularly teach different IP course at Austral University, San Andres University (both in Argentina) as well as in Chicago-Kent (USA).

In February 2016 I was appointed Director of Business and Professional development, in November 2017 a partner at Moeller IP Advisors and in November 2018 Head of Moeller Legal Department where I have been managing projects performed by a group of lawyers and technical experts handling patents and IP litigation, regulatory affairs, plant varieties rights, personal data protection and other legal areas related to innovation and technology migrating to the digital world.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Mariano had started working on different civil and criminal courts in Buenos Aires since the beginning of his legal studies in 1996 until he received his law degree with specialization on administrative law from the Universidad de Buenos Aires in November 2001.
Then he joined a general practice law firm and afterwards pursued an LL.M. in International Intellectual Property Law from Chicago-Kent, which we achieved with high honors in 2004. In 2008, Mariano completed a second LL.M. in Law and Economics from the Universidad Torcuato Di Tella in Argentina.']

Details: ['Elizabeth Ward', 'The Brand Expert. Advisor to many big brand owners and sought after by Forbes and the BBC for advise and insight in brand disputes.', 'Leeds, Inglaterra, Reino Unido']
About:
["Whether your problem is how to protect your brand or how do you make money from your trade marks and ideas, I lead a team who can help you. Our mantra is, if we can't add value to your business, then we will tell you and send you away to rethink things! This relentless focus on our clients interest and winning whenever we can is precisely what has made us an award winning team. We're not reactive, we're proactive. We treat you as a long term partner and treat you accordingly. As a lawyer, a former scientist in the pharma industry, & a business owner, I understand business. I take a commercial and straightforward approach. No jargon - just plain English. #intellectualproperty #trademarks

Iâ€™m considered one of the leading IP solicitors in the UK:
â€˜A Leader in the Fieldâ€™ (of IP, ranked 2009 - 2020, Chambers & Partners)
Supervising Solicitor to execute Search Orders & Freezing Orders
5-star Author: If Youâ€™re so Clever Why Arenâ€™t You Rich? IP - 10 Ways to Take Your Genius to the Bank

My team of specialist IP lawyers & I work with:

IN-HOUSE COUNSEL to support them in IP disputes and strategies e.g. managing trade mark portfolios.

BUSINESS OWNERS & LEADERS of fast-growth coâ€™s looking to raise funds or export & expand overseas. I can determine & create the right distribution model to keep control of key assets & protect against counterfeiting.

SCIENTISTS & TECH ENTREPRENEURS to establish value in ideas & products; new products, re-purposing existing drugs, and/or combining new tech e.g. targeted use of therapeutics. Finding & protecting the value of data e.g. trial results.

BRAND PORTFOLIO MANAGERS, CREATIVES, MARKETERS to do brand & trade mark clearance searches (global), register new brands, maintain brand & trade mark portfolios. Actively manage anti-counterfeit efforts, monitoring goods, working w/ suppliers, setting up alerts & working with Government agencies e.g. HMRC & UK Border Agency."]

Details: ['Ian Finch', 'Partner at James & Wells | Intellectual Property, Patents, Trade Marks', 'Nueva Zelanda']
About:
['I have been employed in the Intellectual Property field since 1991 specialising in IP litigation since the late 1990's.

During this time I have acted for many local and multi-national companies helping them to obtain and enforce their rights in New Zealand. I provide opinions on the validity and infringement of patents, copyright and trade marks, as well as advice regarding trade secrets and consumer protection legislation such as the Fair Trading Act.

I have extensive litigation experience across a range of industries with particular emphasis on the construction, manufacturing and engineering industries.

I have been lead counsel in many of New Zealandâ€™s leading intellectual property decisions - including the first copyright case to be considered by our Supreme Court.

I am the general editor of "James & Wells Intellectual Property Law in New Zealandâ€, published by Thomson Reuters, and have been a speaker at numerous conferences on the subject of intellectual property enforcement. I am also individually recommended by PLC Which lawyer? in the field of Intellectual Property.

I currently sit on the Advisory Boards of Award Attachments LImited and the Auckland University of Technology Business Innovation Centre, helping advise start ups on a broad range of intellectual property and commercial issues.

Finally, I am Past-President of the New Zealand Institute of Patent Attorneys.

Specialties: Intellectual property protection and litigation - particularly in the the construction, manufacturing and engineering industries.']

Details: ['Michael B. Stewart - Intl Patent Attorney', 'Litigator and Intellectual Property Specialist, Patent Law, Intellectual Property Law, Trademark Law, Copyright Law, IT Law', 'Bloomfield Hills, Michigan, Estados Unidos']
About:
['Fishman Stewart attorneys are dedicated to the practice of intellectual property law. 
As strategic advisors to CEOs and senior executives throughout the world, we help maximize the value of our clientâ€™s â€œintellectual capitalâ€.

With our worldwide clients, Fishman Stewart is an intellectual property law firm that specializes in identifying, securing and advancing creativity.

In addition to my Juris Doctorate, I have a master's degree in engineering and an English degree.

I am a frequent speaker on intellectual property protection and enforcement. My presentations have included audiences associated with many organizations including universities, bar associations, the United States Patent and Trademark Office, the National Science Foundation, the American Intellectual Property Law Association and the International Trademark Association. My articles have been published by numerous publications and I am on the editorial board for the Engineering Society of Detroit.

I work in a wide range of technical areas including mechanical, aerospace, electrical, computer, and nuclear engineering. My practice encompasses domestic and foreign patent prosecution, e-commerce and information technology, patent opinions, intellectual property litigation (including domain name arbitration proceedings, and both state and federal court actions), mediations and arbitrations, domestic and foreign trademark prosecution, trademark opinions, copyrights, trade secrets, rights of publicity, intellectual property evaluations/due diligence, and agreements.

@navigateip, which can be found on either Twitter(R) "twitter.com/navigateip" or Facebook(R) "facebook.com/navigateip", is a microblog providing a culling of stories and solutions directed toward creative innovations in technology, privacy and intellectual property (e.g., patents, copyrights, trademarks and trade secrets).']

Details: ['CA Jithu Koshy', "Skilling & Placing India's Future Generation @ Virohan | General Manager - Finance & Accounts | Phoenix - Rise from the Ashes ğŸ”¥ |", 'Cochin, Kerala, India']
About:
["Until 17, I had a great life. At 18, I did not have money to pay my college fees & dropped out. At 22, I became a CA. From then on, never looked back. Education is Liberation & my mission is to make a positive impact in the life of fellow human beings through the medium of Education. Anything studies, education, career-related, personal finance management - reach out friends. Always happy to have a conversation. 

Coming to work life, 6 years of audit life in 2 incredible firms - Varma & Varma Chartered accountants and KPMG, followed by another 6 years with an amazing telecom company in Qatar - the Incumbent operator - Ooredoo, 2.5 years at Vivartana Ventures India Private Limited building the finance team, strategy and product development in the 0 to 1 journey and now with Virohan as the finance business partner in the blitzscaling journey. My profession is Finance, the heart is that of an entrepreneur & passion is education. Happy to be working at the intersection of the three from April 2019.

Yet to figure out where we want to settle down for the long term - GCC / India / First world country. As a family, in the process of figuring out.

Always believed in the power of numbers to speak & in the power of businesses with social responsibility. We come on earth and we go - while we are here, it is our duty to live responsibly.

I am active on Linkedin now, building my connections, learning from seniors, widening horizons & perspectives, and even if there is an Iota of chance for me to contribute to someone else's life, doing that with my limited resources & capabilities.

Note: I have reserved 10 pm IST Monday to Friday for any of you who would like to bounce off with me on any aspects such as Financial Independence, Personal growth hack strategies, Time Management, Professional growth & choices, side hustles, and so on. Feel free to book a slot at www.phoenixjithu.com and I will be there to talk to you and share my limited experience and knowledge."]

Details: ['Jogi Gujral CMA (USA), CFM, CSCA, FCA (India), FCMA (India)', 'Senior Corporate Controller | Taxation | MIS | Treasury | Financial Statements |SAP | Manufacturing | Fortune 500', 'Toronto, Ontario, CanadÃ¡']
About:
['I am a global financial controller with more than 25 years of senior leadership experience, having worked extensively as a finance and accounting head in four continents and travelled to 27 countries. I love working with driven senior management teams to make things happen. 

I have successfully managed five full life cycle implementations with Fortune 500 clients in Canada, UAE and South Asia within a 365/AX, Oracle and SAP FICO manufacturing environment across all modules and through all phases of the Project.

I have extensive knowledge of best manufacturing practices and principals with Fortune 500 U.S. MNCâ€™s. My current job includes documentation regarding risks, issues with configurations, ERP implementations, reports, and on-going support. Successfully re-engineered business processes by implementing an efficient new ERP system, mitigating risk.

Extensive knowledge of D365/AX Finance modules and functional capabilities. Cross-functional knowledge of D365/AX and functional capabilities in PowerBI, Supply Chain (Trade & Logistics), Manufacturing, Project Costing, Accounting, Reporting, Tax, Finance, Financial Planning and Analysis, and Service Management.

Performed Canadian SOX and Internal Controls in Canadian Company and SOX on U.S. operations.

I am CFM (Certified Financial Manager), CSCA (Certified in Strategy and Competitive Analysis), CMA (USA), FCA (India), Fellow Member of The Institute of Chartered Accountants of India and FCMA (India) Fellow Member of The Institute of Cost Accountants of India. Additionally, I have completed Masters in Business Administration from IIM (Bangalore, India), one of the Premium Business Schools of South Asia.
I have cleared Capstone1, 2, and Day 1 of CFE conducted by CPA Canada. I currently do not reside in Ontario, and am not governed by CPA Ontario.']

['I believe that, when people are learning, they are growing. Iâ€™m on a quest to make excellence a part of those lives that I come in contact with. For me, every day is an opportunity to make the world that I live and work in a better, more creative and more compassionate place.

Iâ€™m a lifelong optimist who believes that no mountain is too high to climb, every obstacle has a solution attached to it and even the most far-reaching dreams can be realised with imagination, creativity and resilience. My passion is to help the people I come in contact with turn a great idea into a breakthrough experience that can be seen, touched and felt globally.

I see that obstacles are just opportunities in disguise. Always looking over the next horizon, I am constantly seeking a chance to be a part of that one innovation that can change the way people experience the world.

For nearly 30 years, on four continents, I have helped organisations of all types and sizes learn the art of leadership, influence and technology disruption. My clients learn how to utilise entrepreneurial vision, creative thinking and innovation strategies to become experts in digital, sales, marketing, and brand loyalty. From new startups to big brands, I have helped teams get smarter while the business grows.

Before joining the global consulting ranks with IBM, CSC, Creata and Fujitsu, I was a graphic artist, animator and creative director- all skills that have served me well as I developed my consulting skills. At Trinity Consulting Services, I have been an expert in the commercialisation of new ideas and the global growth of existing businesses in APAC, Europe/EMEA and Australia.

As one of LinkedInâ€™s most awarded influencers, recognised with a 2018 LinkedIn Power Profile - #1 in Marketing & Advertising and 2018 LinkedIn Top Voice (Australia) and Most Influential Agency Voice in Asia Pacific in 2016.

If you want to talk about business growth, strategic direction, creative thinking and operational leadership, Iâ€™d love to talk!']
